phrs.translation: 共和国广场, 共和广场, 广场
意大利共和国, 意大利
共和广场, 共和国广场
共和国地铁站, 距离共和地铁站

sentences.sentence: La Repubblica and El Pais are politically independent newspapers which share similar characteristics.
sentences.translation: 《共和国报》和《国家报》是政治独立的报纸，具有相似特征。

sentences.sentence: La Repubblica daily said Prefect Bride had an out-dated vision of women's role in society.
sentences.translation: La Repubblica日报说《完美新娘》对女性社会角色的理解太过时了。

sentences.sentence: MILAN - La Repubblica have published an interview Hernan Crespo gave to English paper the Daily Mail.
sentences.translation: 米兰—《共和报》转载了克雷斯波接受英国报纸《每日邮报》的采访。
